author: Michael Toole
subject: Re: Harimao
body:
--- DANIEL ZELTER <danielzelter@hotmail.com> wrote:
> It's up for pre-order at 
> 

Cool.  On a similar note, has anyone been able to find
Secret of Twilight Gemini in stores?  I tried to get a
screener copy from Funimation but got no response, so
I've been scouring the local stores for it, and nobody
seems to have it... kind of odd, considering how I'm
seeing Blue Gender and Yu Yu Hakusho everywhere.

--Mike Toole
